com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.utilities

Class CallSoon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.utilities.CallSoon

  • public class CallSoon
extends Object
    Provides a system for invoking a Runnable shortly in the Swing thread with optional coalescing of multiple calls and an optional delay until the runnable is invoked. Runnables are added using add(Runnable), add(Runnable, long, boolean) or add(Runnable, long, boolean, com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.utilities.CallSoon.EnabledProvider) and pending runnables can be cancelled using cancel(Runnable).
    Since:
    API 4.60 (Geneious 5.6.0)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  CallSoon.EnabledProvider
      Provides a method for specifying whether something is enabled

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public static void add(Runnable runnable)
        Invokes this runnable soon (like using SwingUtilities.invokeLater(Runnable)) in the event dispatch thread. If multiple calls are made to this method before the runnable is invoked, these are coalesced into a single call.
        Parameters:
        runnable - the runnable call soon.

      • add

        public static void add(Runnable runnable,
       long delayInMilliseconds,
       boolean overrideExisting)
        Invokes this runnable soon (like using SwingUtilities.invokeLater(Runnable)) in the event dispatch thread. If multiple calls are made to this method before the runnable is invoked, these are coalesced into a single call.
        Parameters:
        runnable - the runnable call soon.
        delayInMilliseconds - the number of milliseconds to wait. May be 0 to invoke as soon as possible.
        overrideExisting - If true, then any already queued instance of this runnable is removed before scheduling it again at the new time.

      • add

        public static void add(Runnable runnable,
       long delayInMilliseconds,
       boolean overrideExisting,
       CallSoon.EnabledProvider enabledProvider)
        Invoke this runnable soon in the Event dispatch thread.
        Parameters:
        runnable - the runnable to run
        delayInMilliseconds - the number of milliseconds to wait. May be 0 to invoke as soon as possible.
        overrideExisting - If true, then any already queued instance of this runnable is removed before scheduling it again at the new time.
        enabledProvider - if this isn't null, then once the time has elapsed, the runnable will not be run until enabledProvider.isEnabled returns true,

      • cancel

        public static boolean cancel(Runnable runnable)
        Cancels a pending runnable (added via one of the methods if it has not yet been invoked
        Returns:
        true if there was an entry for this runnable that was cancelled.
